text: Kópavogur is a city in southwest Iceland. As of 2015, 33,205 people lived there. The mayor of Kópavogur is Ásdís Kristjánsdóttir. ==Other websites== * Official Website Category:Cities in Iceland Category:Municipalities of Iceland Category:1948 establishments in Europe Category:1940s establishments in Iceland Category:Capital Region (Iceland)
title: Kópavogur
